item.title: 世界经济论坛施瓦布 50 多年后卸任
item.description: 世界经济论坛创始人克劳斯-施瓦布（Klaus Schwab）在执掌世界经济论坛 50 多年后，已从该组织董事会卸任。【原文：The founder of the World Economic Forum Klaus Schwab has stepped down from the organization’s board of directors after more than 50 years at the helm.】

item.title: 高盛召集对冲基金大亨寻找中东现金
item.description: 当大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）向肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）承认，今年公司上市数量激增的希望到目前为止还没有实现时，全场响起了一阵紧张的笑声。【原文：When David Solomon admitted to Ken Griffin that hopes for a surge in companies going public this year had so far been miserably unfulfilled, a nervous laugh rippled through the room.】

item.title: 特朗普关税促使美国消费者上网寻求中国便宜货
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，娜塔莉-龙（Natalie Lung）将探讨中国电子商务网站作为受关税影响的美国消费者的慰藉之所的受欢迎程度。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Natalie Lung addresses the popularity of Chinese e-commerce sites as a place of solace for tariff-stricken US consumers.】

item.title: 将唐纳德-特朗普与人际圈联系起来的人
item.description:
约翰-沙希迪是年轻人投票支持特朗普的重要原因。【原文：

John Shahidi is a big part of why young men turned out to vote for Trump.

】

item.title: 全球央行面临特朗普贸易战的混乱局面
item.description: 我是资深经济学编辑克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling）。今天我们将探讨中央银行的前景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior economics editor. Today we’re looking at the outlook for central banks. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 风险加剧，英伟达投资者对被打压的估值望而却步
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的股价接近人工智能时代的最低估值，但越来越多的危险因素让投资者对利用这一波下跌持谨慎态度。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shares are trading near their lowest valuation of the artificial intelligence era, but a growing list of perils has investors cautious about taking advantage of the dip.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税可能会损害美国经济。打击移民使情况更糟
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统遏制移民的努力正值美国劳动力市场岌岌可危之际，就在关税准备拖累经济活动之际，他的努力有可能扼杀一个关键的增长引擎。【原文：President Donald Trump’s efforts to curb immigration are coming at a precarious time for the US labor market, threatening to choke off a key growth engine just as tariffs are poised to drag down economic activity.】

item.title: 特朗普鲍威尔威胁 "出卖美国 "贸易
item.description:
鲍威尔被解雇的风险正在削弱投资者对美国资产的信心。【原文：

The risk of Powell’s firing is eroding investor confidence in US assets.

】

item.title: AMG 收购多策略对冲基金 Verition 少数股权
item.description: Affiliated Managers Group Inc. 将收购多策略投资公司 Verition Fund Management 的少数股权，从而在 4.5 万亿美元行业中增长最快的对冲基金中分一杯羹。【原文：Affiliated Managers Group Inc. is acquiring a minority stake in multistrategy investment firm Verition Fund Management, snapping up a piece of one of the fastest growing hedge funds in the $4.5 trillion industry.】

item.title: 中国拥有的超级油轮每次赴美将面临 520 万美元的罚款
item.description: 随着华盛顿和北京之间的贸易战持续发酵，根据美国惩罚亚洲国家制造的船只的最新提议，中国制造的超级油轮将被处以更高的罚款。【原文：Made-in-China oil supertankers are set to be slapped with more hefty charges under America’s latest proposal to penalize ships manufactured in the Asian nation as the trade war between Washington and Beijing rages on.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克警告关税引发欧元区衰退风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克说，美国宣布的关税激化了不确定性，增加了欧元区经济衰退的风险。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said that tariffs announced by the US were stoking uncertainty and raising the risk of an economic recession in the euro area.】

item.title: 东南亚犯罪集团不畏打击，走向世界
item.description: 联合国警告说，尽管最近受到执法部门的打击，但在东南亚地区经营数十亿美元诈骗业务的网络犯罪集团仍在不断扩大，从爱尔兰到墨西哥都在建立联系，并有可能在全球范围内造成不可逆转的蔓延。【原文：Cyber crime syndicates that run multi-billion-dollar scam operations across Southeast Asia are still expanding despite recent law enforcement crackdowns, building links from Ireland to Mexico and reaching a potentially irreversible global spillover, the United Nations warned.】

item.title: 日本央行认为改变基本加息立场的必要性不大
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，尽管美国关税带来了不确定性，但日本央行官员认为目前几乎没有必要改变逐步提高利率的现有立场。【原文：Bank of Japan officials see little need to change their existing stance of gradually raising interest rates for now despite uncertainties stemming from US tariffs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谷歌与美国司法部重回法庭，争夺搜索垄断地位
item.description: 自 1982 年的 AT&T 以来，美国政府从未解散过一家公司。现在，美国政府正试图说服法官将 Alphabet Inc.【原文：The US government hasn’t broken up a company since AT&T in 1982. Now it’s trying to persuade a judge to make Alphabet Inc.’s Google next.】

item.title: 中国和印尼高层官员建立更紧密的安全联系
item.description: 中国和印尼根据去年商定的形式举行了首次高级部长会议，这次会谈正值中国政府向亚洲国家示好并抵消与美国贸易紧张局势之际。【原文：China and Indonesia held their first meeting of senior ministers under a format agreed to last year, a sitdown that coincides with Beijing’s push to woo Asian nations and offset trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 伊拉克将连续第三年避免进口小麦作为国家重要口粮
item.description: 伊拉克一位高级官员表示，伊拉克政府预计将能够从当地农民手中购买足够的小麦用于其重要的补贴计划，从而连续第三年避免进口小麦。【原文：Iraq’s government expects it will be able to buy enough wheat from local farmers for its crucial subsidy program to avoid imports for a third year in a row, a top state official said.】

item.title: 股市走高，投资者准备承受更多痛苦
item.description: 股市已从本月大跌的深渊中回升，但从盘面上看，交易员们正在为他们的头寸添加健康剂量的避险资产。【原文：The stock market has clawed back from the depths of this month’s selloff, but a look under the hood shows traders are adding a healthy dose of safe haven to their positions.】

item.title: 阿达尼公司将利用人工智能需求将数据中心投资额提高 100 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）计划追加 100 亿美元投资，在印度建设数据中心，这位亿万富翁希望抓住人工智能和业务流程主导型服务需求激增的机遇。【原文：Gautam Adani plans to invest an additional $10 billion to build data centers in India, people familiar with the matter said, as the billionaire looks to ride the boom in demand for artificial intelligence and business process-led services.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司与中国比亚迪达成协议，探索新型电动汽车技术
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯国家石油公司和中国主要电动汽车制造商之一同意探讨在新能源汽车技术方面开展更紧密的合作，此举将使世界上最大的原油出口国和消费国携手引领移动领域的变革。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s state oil company and one of China’s main electric carmakers agreed to explore closer collaboration on new energy vehicle technology, a move that would bring the world’s biggest crude exporter and consumer together to navigate changes in mobility.】

item.title: 中国出口导向型增长使经济面临更严重的关税冲击
item.description: 中国第一季度强于预期的经济增长掩盖了一个关键的弱点：对国外需求的依赖性越来越大，这增加了贸易紧张局势加剧对经济造成更严重打击的威胁。【原文：China’s stronger-than-expected growth in the first quarter masks a key vulnerability: a growing dependence on foreign demand, which increases the threat of a sharper economic hit as trade tensions soar.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预计今年出口减少、油价下跌
item.description: 俄罗斯下调了今年的出口展望，并降低了对石油价格的预期，这可能会迫使政府动用财富基金来支付战时开支。【原文：Russia downgraded its outlook for exports this year and lowered expectations for the price for its oil, developments that may force the government to dip into its wealth fund to cover wartime spending.】

item.title: CATL 在上海科技日上发布电动汽车电池技术进展
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车电池生产商当代安培雷克斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.全球最大的电动汽车电池生产商安培雷斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co., Ltd.）发布了其最新款的电池产品，大力宣传其产品的耐用性和续航能力，因为电动汽车在人们心目中的局限性仍然阻碍着许多消费者改用电动汽车。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s biggest producer of batteries for electric vehicles, unveiled the latest versions of its cells, playing up the durability and range of its products as the perceived limits of EVs still stop many consumers from making the switch.】

item.title: 马丁-沃尔夫谈特朗普对全球秩序的颠覆
item.description:
彻底改革世界贸易。【原文：

A complete overhaul of world trade.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：马丁-沃尔夫谈特朗普重塑世界贸易（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：马丁-沃尔夫谈特朗普重塑世界贸易（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Martin Wolf on Trump’s Remake of World Trade (Podcast)】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官游说日本提供更多电力和数据中心以推动人工智能发展
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋周一会见了日本首相石破茂，推动增加发电量以满足人工智能的需求。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang met with Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba on Monday to push for more electricity generation to meet artificial intelligence’s needs.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊说，美国利润前景很少如此黯淡
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）表示，由于经济严重放缓的风险，分析师们正忙于削减美国的盈利预期。【原文：Analysts are busy slashing earnings estimates in the US due to the risk of a severe economic slowdown, according to Morgan Stanley’s Michael Wilson.】

item.title: 印度股市迎来 2021 年初以来最大的五日反弹
item.description: 印度股市连续第五个交易日上涨，反映出投资者继续乐观地认为，印度市场将为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普不断升级的贸易战提供一个相对的避风港。【原文：Indian stocks rose for a fifth straight session, reflecting continued investor optimism that the market would offer a relative haven from US President Donald Trump’s escalating trade war.】

item.title: 对冲基金抢购日元汇率交易员，关税震撼市场
item.description: 在关税引发的动荡席卷日本政府债券市场之际，两家对冲基金正在从全球银行招聘日元汇率交易员。【原文：A pair of hedge funds are hiring yen rates traders from global banks, even as tariff-induced turmoil sweeps the Japanese government bond market.】

item.title: 印度财政部长本周将在贸易谈判期间会见贝森特
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）本周将在华盛顿会见美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent），两国距离今年晚些时候达成贸易协定的时间越来越近。【原文：India’s Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will meet US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent in Washington this week, as the two nations inch closer to sealing a trade pact later this year.】

item.title: 石破称日本不会在美国关税谈判中一味让步
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，日本不会一味屈从美国的要求，就关税问题达成协议，这是自唐纳德-特朗普总统发起全球贸易战以来，他发表的最具战斗性的言论。【原文：Japan won’t just keep conceding to US demands to reach a deal over tariffs, Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said, in some of his most combative remarks since President Donald Trump launched a push for more access to Tokyo’s sensitive auto and agricultural sectors as part of his global trade war.】
